featured.text: Stretch limousines were hired to drive the prom-goers to expensive restaurants or discos for an all-night extravaganza.

definition.zh_def: 圓盤狀的音樂播放裝置，通常用於播放音樂或舞蹈的場所。
definition.en_def: Circular discs used for playing music, often associated with dance venues.
definition.example: The party was lively, with colorful lights and music coming from the discos.
